name: Zombie Outlet
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 125 'Dangerous Collection'.

Your objective is to collect all the 3 items needed for the car. You need to return the items to your car one by one.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Aim/Shoot: Mouse/LMB
  • Reload: R
  • Weapon change: Mouse wheel

Made by:

  • Csnakos
  • niekay
  • teku159
